AUTOLOADdescriptiontopprevnext
sub AUTOLOAD {
    my $self = shift;
    my $attr = $AUTOLOAD;
    $attr =~ s/.*:://;
    return unless $attr  =~ /[^A-Z]/;
    croak "invalid attribute method: ->$attr()" unless $ok_field{$attr};
    my $prev=$self->{uc $attr};
    $self->{uc $attr} = shift if @_;
    return $prev;
}
newdescriptiontopprevnext
sub new {
 my $class=shift;
my @args=@_;
    my ($self) = regdb->new(@args); ##So far only init REGDB handles

##initialize fields
$self->{TRANSCRIPT_ID}= undef;
$self->{GENE_ID} = undef;
$self->{DB_SOURCE_ID} = undef;
$self->{DB_ACCN} = undef;
$self->{ISOFORM} = undef;
$self->{COMMENTS} = undef;


    bless $self,$class;
    return $self;
}
store_transcript_datadescriptiontopprevnext
sub store_transcript_data {
my ($self,$db,$subset,$accn,$geneid,$isoform,$comment)=@_;
 $self->{DB_source_id}=$self->table_insert('DB_source',$db,$subset);
 $self->{transcript_id}=$self->table_insert('transcript',$geneid,$self->{DB_source_id},$accn,$isoform,$comment);
 return $self->{transcript_id};
}
